attributes.action: Remove the knighthood given to Robert Mugabe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To allow this despicable, murderous dictator to retain this honour degrades its significance and is an insult to the traditions of this nation.  Mugabe is immensely proud of his knighthood, despite his ranting insults against the very nation that awarded it to him, and its withdrawal would diminish him more effectively than any sanctions.

rejection.details: The Queen annulled Mugabe's honorary Knighthood in June 2008.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
